title: Advanced paternal age increases risk of early-onset schizophrenia in offspring

title_detail.value: Advanced paternal age increases risk of early-onset schizophrenia in offspring

summary: Advanced paternal age increases the risk in offspring of early-onset schizophrenia, a severe form of the disorder, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Advanced paternal age increases the risk in offspring of early-onset schizophrenia, a severe form of the disorder, according to a new study.
